Name: Pyruvic acid

Sentece: The accuracy and precision of kPL estimates improve substantially for peak signal-to-noise ratio above approximately 20.
Title: Influence of parameter accuracy on pharmacokinetic analysis of hyperpolarized pyruvate.
Name: Pyruvic acid
